name: charsetEncode
description: Uses the specified encoding to convert binary data to a string.

params.name: binaryobject
params.description: A variable containing binary data to decode into text.

params.name: encoding
params.description: The character encoding that was used to encode the string into binary format.

examples.title: Encode a string using utf-8 back into binary encoding of the string
examples.description: use charsetEncode to Encode with utf-8

examples.title: Encode a string using us-ascii back into binary encoding of the string
examples.description: use charsetEncode to Encode with us-ascii
